static member FastTree : Microsoft.ML.BinaryClassificationContext.BinaryClassificationTrainers * Microsoft.ML.StaticPipe.Scalar<bool> * Microsoft.ML.StaticPipe.Vector<single> * Microsoft.ML.StaticPipe.Scalar<single> * int * int * int * double * Action<Microsoft.ML.Runtime.FastTree.FastTreeBinaryClassificationTrainer.Arguments> * Action<Microsoft.ML.Runtime.Internal.Internallearn.IPredictorWithFeatureWeights<single>> -> ValueTuple<Microsoft.ML.StaticPipe.Scalar<single>, Microsoft.ML.StaticPipe.Scalar<single>, Microsoft.ML.StaticPipe.Scalar<bool>>
MemberSignature.Usage: Microsoft.ML.Trainers.FastTreeStatic.FastTree (ctx, label, features, weights, numLeaves, numTrees, minDocumentsInLeafs, learningRate, advancedSettings, onFit)

Docs.param: The number of leaves to use.
Total number of decision trees to create in the ensemble.
The minimal number of documents allowed in a leaf of the tree, out of the subsampled data.

A delegate that is called every time the method is called on the instance created out of this. This delegate will receive the linear model that was trained. Note that this action cannot change the result in any way; it is only a way for the caller to be informed about what was learnt.
Docs.returns: The set of output columns including in order the predicted binary classification score (which will range from negative to positive infinity), the calibrated prediction (from 0 to 1), and the predicted label.

MemberSignature.Usage: Microsoft.ML.Trainers.FastTreeStatic.FastTree (ctx, label, features, weights, numLeaves, numTrees, minDocumentsInLeafs, learningRate, advancedSettings, onFit)

Docs.param: The number of leaves to use.
Total number of decision trees to create in the ensemble.
The minimal number of documents allowed in a leaf of a regression tree, out of the subsampled data.

A delegate that is called every time the method is called on the instance created out of this. This delegate will receive the linear model that was trained. Note that this action cannot change the result in any way; it is only a way for the caller to be informed about what was learnt.
Docs.returns: The Score output column indicating the predicted value.
